text: Roc Casagran or Roc Casagran i Casañas (born 1980) is a Catalan professor and poet. He received the XIII Premi de poesia Parc Taulí (Parc Taulí Poetry Prize) for his work L’ombra queixalada on the subject of the May 1968 student protests. He received the 18th Ciutat de Tarragona Prize for his work Austràlia. == Works == Selected works: * Els carrers de les fàbriques (2002) * Trènicament trennificats (2005) * Austràlia (2007) * Un ós pan­da al pas zebra (2011) * Ara que estem junts (2012) * L’amor fora de mapa (2016) * Direm nosaltres (2018) ISBN 9788416743629. == References == Category:1980 births Category:Spanish poets Category:People from Catalonia Category:Living people
title: Roc Casagran
